TopicTitle: I would like a funny remake of a story.

Articles.Content:
I would like to have a funny remake of this story. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Scorpion_and_the_Frog

I just want to see if you guys are way more creative than me... Thanks if you can!
I am unable to contribute, however I must voice my support for this.
My sense of humour is impaired... Pass.
